UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptides: Insights into Membrane Permeabilization, Lipopolysaccharide Fragmentation and Application in Plant Disease Control.
Literature.Author: Datta A, Ghosh A, Airoldi C, Sperandeo P, Mroue KH, Jiménez-Barbero J, Kundu P, Ramamoorthy A, Bhunia A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=>100µM),Xanthomonas campestris pv. campestris(MIC=>100µM),Xanthomonas oryzae pv. oryzae(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>100µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=>100µM),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=>100µM),Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii H99(MIC=>100µM)
